features: Comfy Cute Chair in Perfect Size: 25.25" wide x 18" deep x 20.5" high is suitable for ages 1-6 years old. Kids Chair creates a little world just for kids for reading and unwinding.

Kids Friendly Handle Design: The comfy kids chair is lightweight and the handle design is easy for kids to drag it around and sit wherever they want, whether its reading, playing video games, watching tv, or just relaxing, children can play with this sofa as they please.

Kids Sherpa Chair Safety and Reliability: The kids sofa chair is made of durable snuggly-soft polyester Sherpa and is filled with premium foam to support kid's body. Designed with safety in mind, as there are no sharp corners or hard edges. Additionally, the sofa's arms provide ample support, so there is no need to be concerned about the child rolling off.

Unique Gift for Boys and Girls: A good looking for your tollder that will match with any room. Super soft comfortable chair with plenty of room for child to sit on. The chair is also a favorite of mid size dog that he will get up and find his comfy spot.
Machine Washable: The removable cover with a zipper can be easily taken off and washed in the machine in cold water, making maintenance a breeze.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kids Cuddly Soft Sherpa Chair Enhance the coziness of any room by incorporating our popular and comfortable MOMCAYWEX comfy soft chair for your little boys and girls to enjoy reading or unwinding. The child-friendly handle and durable polyester Sherpa, this vibrant seating option is effortless to carry from room to room. Comfy Cute Chair in Perfect Size 25.25" wide x 18" deep x 20.5" high is suitable for ages 1-6 years old. The kids chair is in a perfect size and has a great sitting width and height. Kids Chair creates a little own world just for kids. They can read or watch TV either sitting or lying down. A perfect gift! A Spot for Kids or Pets A great quality chair for kids and pets. As simple as opening the package and the chair begins to take shape on it’s own. Super comfortable and just the right size to use as a cat lounge chair. Also perfect size for small and medium-sized dogs. Kids Friendly Handle Design The comfy kids chair is lightweight and the handle design is easy for kids to drag it around and sit wherever they want, whether its reading, playing video games, watching TV, or just relaxing, children can play with this sofa as they please. Perfect addition to anyone's family room.

High Quality Foam Chair Made of thick foam ensure that it doesn’t get ruined by little feet jumping on it or climbing over it. The entire sofa has no sharp corners or hard edges to ensure the safety of the child. And the kids sofa has a good support, don’t worry about rolling to the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair, worth the money!
reviews.reviewText: Worth the money! I looked at lots of other memory foam chairs, bean bag chairs and read lots of reviews- I settled on buying this chair for my little girls and we love it! My girls already had a bean bag chair at home and now they will only sit in this memory foam chair! Chair comes vacuum sealed in a small bag, after opening it takes 1-2 day to take its full shape.My girls are 1 and 4 years old, they can actually sit in this chair together side by side, chair has lots of room for them to relax in. The chair is strong enough that my girls can even stand on the seat part without falling over. The memory foam keeps its shape. My husband who is 200lbs can also sit in this chair without it losing its shape!Some other things that I also like about this chair is-has a handle on top of the chair to easily carry it around-doesn’t have a weird smell-fabric/material is soft to the touch-the outside fabric/material can be zipped off to easily wash, and inside has Velcro to keep memory foam in place.Would definitely recommend spending the money and buying this chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No smell/ impressive chair
reviews.reviewText: No chemical smell. That was important to us. It inflates quite quickly. It’s soft to thr touch and a great size for my almost two year old but I expect it to last for years to come. We have it in her play tent and it’s adorable! Very impressed as the price is so much less than competitors including Pottery Barn. I’m so glad I gave it a shot. We got the gray which has a very-very slight purple undertone, but is a true gray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size toddler couch
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my almost 3yo. It’s big enough where I can see her fitting into it until 4-5yo. The material is thick and firm enough where it seems like it’ll last us a while. Got it as a Christmas present and it’s holding up pretty well so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars She loved her own chair!
reviews.reviewText: Christmas gift for my granddaughter and she loved it. Well made, soft and perfect for a little one. Her Mom immediately washed it and it was nice a fluffy. Perfect size. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little chair!
reviews.reviewText: My one and a half year old daughter absolutely loves this chair! It is really great in every way. It's a great size for little ones, the fabric is super soft, and the handle on top makes it easy to move around. I was a little worried at first when it came out of the box because it was shrink wrapped and scrunched to oblivion. But within a few hours it puffed up to its full size and within a day or two the wrinkles in the fabric all came out. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Cozy
reviews.reviewText: This chair is very soft and surprisingly sturdy. My 2 y/o granddaughter loves it and sits in it constantly since receiving it a couple of weeks ago. I deducted one star because I do think it is over priced, but that being said, I am happy with it because she loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My one year old loves it
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The chair is a great size for my 15 month old and I think she will be able to use it for a couple years. It’s soft and plush. I like that it has a handle on top to move easily. It’s quite sturdy and sits alone just fine, but note that if your toddler stands on it and leans on the back of it, it can tip over. I recommend placing it against something for safety. Very satisfied with this purchase for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Chair for Toddler
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves sitting and watching shows or with her stuffed animals and this chair was the perfect choice. It's very sturdy and comfy. It's a good size to accommodate her as she grows. The only qualm I have is I wish the back part was taller. It does not support the head because when she sits in it her head goes above the back of the chair. Otherwise it's amazing.
This chair is so comfy and sturdy for my toddler boy!
My grandson is going to love having his own little couch...so well made and very sturdy!
The chair is bigger than I had imagined but it’s awesome! My toddlers LOVE IT! It’s soft, durable, well made product. I’ll probably order a second one sometime!
I’ve seen a few of these compressed couches and this is by far the less tippy and most solid. However the price reflects that. For a kids couch it is a little pricey
